event.descr:
A message received requesting an Acknowledgable be acknowledged.

Acknowledgement Request:%parm[refId]% of type:%parm[ackType]% was received with the action:%parm[ackAction]% was received for User: %parm[ackUser]%

Typically received from an external source or as a choice of an AckReader implementation.
event.logmsg: Acknowledgement Request:%parm[refId]% of type:%parm[ackType]% was received with the action:%parm[ackAction]% was received for User: %parm[ackUser]%.
